00021         template <typename T> class _xmat3
00022     {
00023     private:
00024         // Data 
00025         _xvec3<T> value[3];

00028         //int _size() const {return 3;}

00049         _xvec3<T>& operator[](int i) {return value[i];}

00052             operator const T*() const {return &value[0][0];}

00075 
00076     template <typename T> _xmat3<T> operator* (const T s, const _xmat3<T>& m)
00077     {
00078         return m * s;
00079     }
00080 
00081     template <typename T> _xvec3<T> operator* (const _xvec3<T>& v, const _xmat3<T>& m)
00082     {
00083         _xmat3<T> Transpose;
00084         Transpose[0][0] = m[0][0];
00085         Transpose[1][0] = m[0][1];
00086         Transpose[2][0] = m[0][2];
00087 
00088         Transpose[0][1] = m[1][0];
00089         Transpose[1][1] = m[1][1];
00090         Transpose[2][1] = m[1][2];
00091 
00092         Transpose[0][2] = m[2][0];
00093         Transpose[1][2] = m[2][1];
00094         Transpose[2][2] = m[2][2];
00095         return Transpose * v;
00096     }
00097 } //namespace glm
